ir: create a PLpgSQL procedure to set Black as para_Black in city for records whose Black matches County_ID from county_public_safety filtered by County_ID being para_County_ID, Location being para_Location, Residents_per_officer exceeding para_Residents_per_officer.
plsql: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE sp(para_Black real, para_County_ID integer, para_Location text, para_Residents_per_officer integer) LANGUAGE plpgsql AS $$ BEGIN UPDATE "city" SET "Black" = para_Black WHERE "Black" IN (SELECT "County_ID" FROM "county_public_safety" WHERE "County_ID" = para_County_ID AND "Location" = para_Location AND "Residents_per_officer" > para_Residents_per_officer); END; $$;
